definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: laxness, slackness;—alw. abs. ´[[ר]]:;—´[[כַּף ר]]: Pr 10:4 slack (negligent, idle) hand (opp. [[יַד חָרוּחִים]]); ´[[ר]]: alone = slackness (abstr. for concr. = one who is slack) Pr 12:24 (‖ id.), v:Pr 12:27 (v. [[חרך]]); ´[[נֶפֶשׁ ר]]: Pr 19:15 (‖[[עַחְלָה ]]); as adv. [[עשֶׁׂה]] [[רְמִיׇּה]] ´[[מְלֶאכֶת י]]: Je 48:10.
